channel.title: Storybooks South Africa
channel.description: Storybooks South Africa is designed specifically for teachers, parents, and community members and makes 40 stories from the African Storybook available with text and audio in isiZulu, Xhosa, Afrikaans, English, Sepedi, Setswana, Sesotho, Xitsonga, siSwati, Venda, Southern Ndebele, as well as the most widely spoken other languages of South Africa.
